structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.text: Authorization is hereby granted to all offices, departments, boards, commissions, institutions, and all other agencies of the state government of the Commonwealth of Kentucky to make payments to the contribution fund out of moneys, not required by law or contract to be expended for other purposes, in any revolving, trust or agency fund, or out of appropriations for recurring expenses heretofore or hereafter made by the General Assembly from the general expenditure fund or special funds.
law.history: Created 1951 (1st Extra Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 3, sec. 8.
